## To rebuild the package using devtools:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::build_vignettes()
devtools::build(binary = FALSE)
devtools::install()
```

## To create new version without uploading a build version of the package

1. build & reload (if any change outside vignettes)

2. 

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::build_vignettes()
```

3. commit and push.

The students can then use:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("courtiol/LM2GLMM")
```

The vignette swon't show but they exist, so access them using:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
browseURL(paste0(find.package("LM2GLMM"), "/doc/index.html"))
```


## Install behind IZW proxy

```{r, eval = FALSE}
httr::with_config(httr::use_proxy("192.168.2.2:3128"), devtools::install_github("courtiol/LM2GLMM"))
```
